network

Class Node

  • java.lang.Object
    • network.Node

  • public class Node
extends java.lang.Object
    Version:
    1.0 Class Node implements a possible routing location and contains a List of possible neighbors that may be "visited"
    Author:
    Alex Hoecht, Andrew Ward, Mohamed Dahrouj, Shasthra Ranasinghe
